about_the_game:
From mysterious wizards to powerful titans, Monster Pack II battlers are a journey into the mysterious world of fantasy monsters. Including both the classic staples such as golems, dragons and imps, as well as unique enemies such as possessed statues, cave beasts and juggling jesters, this brightly-colored set is there to help you enhance your enemy encounters.

Whether you're on a lookout for a new enemy rotation or need an inspiration boost for constructing your game's lore, Seraph Circle: Monster Pack II is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG Maker Resources.

Features:

  • 19 unique battler types, with multiple variations for a total of 99 battlers.
  • Front and side views available.
  • Unique painted style, with bright colors and contrast that matches Seraph Circle Sideview Battler Pack 1.
  • Illustrations based on both classic fantasy and modern imagination, for a memorable look.
  • Formatted for use in RPG Maker MV.
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Seraph Circle: Monster Pack 2" and "RPG Maker MV - Seraph Circle: Monster Pack 2" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
